intro: Pteromonnina macrostachya, commonly known as the large-stalked pteromonnina, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Due to its ornamental value, it is sometimes cultivated in botanical gardens and as a landscape plant.
